verses.verse: And the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me, saying,<WH559>

Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> prophesy<WH5012> against<WH5921> the shepherds<WH7462> of Israel,<WH3478> prophesy,<WH5012> and say<WH559> to them, Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069> to the shepherds;<WH7462> Woe<WH1945> be to the shepherds<WH7462> of Israel<WH3478> that do feed<WH7462> themselves! should not the shepherds<WH7462> feed<WH7462> the flocks?<WH6629>
You eat<WH398> the fat,<WH2459> and you clothe<WH3847> you with the wool,<WH6785> you kill<WH2076> them that are fed:<WH1277> but you feed<WH7462> not the flock.<WH6629>

The diseased<WH2456> have you not strengthened,<WH2388> neither<WH3808> have you healed<WH7495> that which was sick,<WH2470> neither<WH3808> have you bound<WH2280> up that which was broken,<WH7665> neither<WH3808> have you brought<WH7725> again<WH7725> that which was driven<WH5080> away, neither<WH3808> have you sought<WH1245> that which was lost;<WH6> but with force<WH2394> and with cruelty<WH6531> have you ruled<WH7287> them.

And they were scattered,<WH6327> because there is no<WH1097> shepherd:<WH7462> and they became<WH1961> meat<WH402> to all<WH3605> the beasts<WH2416> of the field,<WH7704> when they were scattered.<WH6327>

My sheep<WH6629> wandered<WH7686> through all<WH3605> the mountains,<WH2022> and on every<WH3605> high<WH7311> hill:<WH1389> yes, my flock<WH6629> was scattered<WH6327> on all<WH3605> the face<WH6440> of the earth,<WH776> and none<WH369> did search<WH1875> or seek<WH1245> after them.
Therefore,<WH3651> you shepherds,<WH7462> hear<WH8085> the word<WH1697> of the LORD;<WH3068>

As I live,<WH2416> said<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD,<WH3069> surely<WH518> <WH3808> because<WH3282> my flock<WH6629> became<WH1961> a prey,<WH957> and my flock<WH6629> became<WH1961> meat<WH402> to every<WH3605> beast<WH2416> of the field,<WH7704> because there was no<WH369> shepherd,<WH7462> neither<WH3808> did my shepherds<WH7462> search<WH1875> for my flock,<WH6629> but the shepherds<WH7462> fed<WH7462> themselves, and fed<WH7462> not my flock;<WH6629>
Therefore,<WH3651> O you shepherds,<WH7462> hear<WH8085> the word<WH1697> of the LORD;<WH3068>

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Behold,<WH2005> I am against<WH413> the shepherds;<WH7462> and I will require<WH1875> my flock<WH6629> at their hand,<WH3027> and cause them to cease<WH7673> from feeding<WH7462> the flock;<WH6629> neither<WH3808> shall the shepherds<WH7462> feed<WH7462> themselves<WH853> any more;<WH5750> for I will deliver<WH5337> my flock<WH6629> from their mouth,<WH6310> that they may not be meat<WH402> for them.
For thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Behold,<WH2005> I, even I, will both search<WH1875> my sheep,<WH6629> and seek<WH1239> them out.

As a shepherd<WH7462> seeks<WH1243> out his flock<WH5739> in the day<WH3117> that he is among<WH8432> his sheep<WH6629> that are scattered;<WH6566> so<WH3651> will I seek<WH1239> out my sheep,<WH6629> and will deliver<WH5337> them out of all<WH3605> places<WH4725> where<WH834> <WH8033> they have been scattered<WH6327> in the cloudy<WH6051> and dark<WH6205> day.<WH3117>

And I will bring<WH3318> them out from the people,<WH5971> and gather<WH6908> them from the countries,<WH776> and will bring<WH935> them to their own land,<WH127> and feed<WH7462> them on the mountains<WH2022> of Israel<WH3478> by the rivers,<WH650> and in all<WH3605> the inhabited<WH4186> places of the country.<WH776>

I will feed<WH7462> them in a good<WH2896> pasture,<WH4829> and on the high<WH4791> mountains<WH2022> of Israel<WH3478> shall their fold<WH5116> be: there<WH8033> shall they lie<WH7257> in a good<WH2896> fold,<WH5116> and in a fat<WH8082> pasture<WH4829> shall they feed<WH7462> on the mountains<WH2022> of Israel.<WH3478>
I will feed<WH7462> my flock,<WH6629> and I will cause them to lie<WH7257> down,<WH7901> said<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>

I will seek<WH1245> that which was lost,<WH6> and bring<WH7725> again<WH7725> that which was driven<WH5080> away, and will bind<WH2280> up that which was broken,<WH7665> and will strengthen<WH2388> that which was sick:<WH2470> but I will destroy<WH8045> the fat<WH8082> and the strong;<WH2389> I will feed<WH7462> them with judgment.<WH4941>

And as for you, O my flock,<WH6629> thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Behold,<WH2005> I judge<WH8199> between<WH996> cattle<WH7716> and cattle,<WH7716> between the rams<WH352> and the he goats.<WH6260>

Seems it a small<WH4592> thing to you to have eaten<WH7462> up the good<WH2896> pasture,<WH4829> but you must tread<WH7429> down with your feet<WH7272> the residue<WH3499> of your pastures?<WH4829> and to have drunk<WH8354> of the deep<WH4950> waters,<WH4325> but you must foul<WH7515> the residue<WH3498> with your feet?<WH7272>
And as for my flock,<WH6629> they eat<WH7462> that which you have trodden<WH7429> with your feet;<WH7272> and they drink<WH8354> that which you have fouled<WH4833> with your feet.<WH7272>

Therefore<WH3651> thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069> to them; Behold,<WH2005> I, even I, will judge<WH8199> between<WH996> the fat<WH1277> cattle<WH7716> and between<WH996> the lean<WH7330> cattle.<WH7716>

Because<WH3282> you have thrust<WH1920> with side<WH6654> and with shoulder,<WH3802> and pushed<WH5055> all<WH3605> the diseased<WH2456> with your horns,<WH7161> till<WH5704> you have scattered<WH6327> them abroad;<WH2351>
Therefore will I save<WH3467> my flock,<WH6629> and they shall no<WH3808> more<WH5750> be a prey;<WH957> and I will judge<WH8199> between<WH996> cattle<WH7716> and cattle.<WH7716>

And I will set<WH6965> up one<WH259> shepherd<WH7462> over<WH5921> them, and he shall feed<WH7462> them, even<WH853> my servant<WH5650> David;<WH1732> he shall feed<WH7462> them, and he shall be their shepherd.<WH7462>
And I the LORD<WH3068> will be their God,<WH430> and my servant<WH5650> David<WH1732> a prince<WH5387> among<WH8432> them; I the LORD<WH3068> have spoken<WH1696> it.

And I will make<WH3772> with them a covenant<WH1285> of peace,<WH7965> and will cause the evil<WH7451> beasts<WH2416> to cease<WH7673> out of the land:<WH776> and they shall dwell<WH3427> safely<WH983> in the wilderness,<WH4057> and sleep<WH3462> in the woods.<WH3264>

And I will make<WH5414> them and the places round<WH5439> about my hill<WH1389> a blessing;<WH1293> and I will cause the shower<WH1653> to come<WH3381> down<WH3381> in his season;<WH6256> there shall be showers<WH1653> of blessing.<WH1293>

And the tree<WH6086> of the field<WH7704> shall yield<WH5414> her fruit,<WH6529> and the earth<WH776> shall yield<WH5414> her increase,<WH2981> and they shall be safe<WH983> in their land,<WH127> and shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD,<WH3068> when I have broken<WH7665> the bands<WH4133> of their yoke,<WH5923> and delivered<WH5337> them out of the hand<WH3027> of those that served<WH5647> themselves of them.

And they shall no<WH3808> more<WH5750> be a prey<WH957> to the heathen,<WH1471> neither<WH3808> shall the beast<WH2416> of the land<WH776> devour<WH398> them; but they shall dwell<WH3427> safely,<WH983> and none<WH369> shall make them afraid.<WH2729>

And I will raise<WH6965> up for them a plant<WH4302> of renown,<WH8034> and they shall be no<WH3808> more<WH5750> consumed<WH622> with hunger<WH7457> in the land,<WH776> neither<WH3808> bear<WH5375> the shame<WH3639> of the heathen<WH1471> any more.<WH5750>

Thus shall they know<WH3045> that I the LORD<WH3068> their God<WH430> am with them, and that they, even the house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> are my people,<WH5971> said<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>
And you my flock,<WH6629> the flock<WH6629> of my pasture,<WH4830> are men,<WH120> and I am your God,<WH430> said<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>
